page.title: 08IMPORTANT EVENTS IN HASTINGS
page.content: Every weekend events occur which are locally important. These include sports fixtures, jumble sales in the winter and fetes in the summer. THese are run by many local clubs. In the summer there are 2 carnivals which provide entertainment for many tourists. One is the main carnival and the other is based in the Old Town. In the autumn Hastings Day is celebrated around October 14 to commemmorate the most important event in local history the Battle in 1066. The most important event in the winter is the international chess congress which attracts entrnts from all over the world. In March there is a competitive musical festival which includes all aspects of music, poetry and drama.
